question: How does Zoloft affect metabolism? I started 50 mg of Zoloft 6 yrs ago and in that time, despite working out 3- 5 times a week and dieting, I gained 35 lbs. I am 42 and have no thyroid isssues or diabetes. I have always been fit and trim and my parents are as well.   Almost as soon as I started it, 10 lbs popped on, then 5-10 more every year. I have weaned myself off of it and have not had it in my body for almost a month.
title: How does Zoloft affect metabolism?
